TopicTitle: I'm getting a nullReferenceException every time I load my save game.

Articles.Content: Known issue with dismissing crew (Jeb in your case). Claw wrote a fix for it which should solve your problem (CrewRosterFreezeFix.dll).

I've been very specifically avoiding using Bill, Bob, and Jeb. Thanks for the help!

- - - Updated - - -

Update: Adding those dll's didn't seem to fix it. Do I need a new save file...?

If you don't want to use Jeb, find problem entries like this:

			FirstCrewToSurvive
			{
				completed = 310.509369506843
				crew
				{
					crews = Jebediah Kerman
				}
			}

And either delete the node or rename the crew reference to an existing kerbal on your roster.

Make a backup first
